list_definition.definition: any of various organic compounds that consist of a nucleoside (= a compound consisting of a sugar and a nitrogen base) linked to a phosphate group, and which is one of the basic structural units of nucleic acids such as DNA

list_ex_of_definition.ex_of_definition: Determining the order of the nucleotides within a gene is known as DNA sequencing.
